-----Original Message-----
From: James <manickd@...>
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 8:03 AM
Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Help a level 20 smith


>From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
>Hi new here. I trained to level 20 at my guild and now it wont let me train
>any more at smithing. it say now "you neeed to davance this skill in the
>feaild." Well I am a oger at level 5... In my home land I have a forge, but
>no one sells a smithing book or molds. Doh.. how silly is that. maybe I
will
>become a poter and make my own. Well till then what is the closest city I
>can train in my trade? molds and smithing books being the keys here!!!
>thanks
>
>
>
